Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 46th overall pick, by Houston in 2014...
Injured on 7/2/2017 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Houston on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 6/16/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $308,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/7/2020, off Josh McLovin (LAA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2021, off Wade LeBlanc (NYA)...
